document_data.name: Saprach's Fine Wines
document_data.services: Wine, fencing stolen property, disposal of bodies
document_data.mainbody: The '''Saprach's Fine Wines''' was a shop in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]] around [[1358 DR]], dedicated to selling [[wine]].
document_data.Location: The store was located in the east side of the city, on Whistleturn Way near the Market.
document_data.Services: The store had the finest selection of wines in Tantras. Furthermore, the proprietor, [[Saprach]], had a sideline of fencing stolen property and also specialized in the discreet disposal of dead bodies.
